statements.statement: select a.alias as Alias, a.familyName as FamilyName, a.firstName as FirstName, a.emailAddress as EmailAddress, b.hobby as Hobby, (select familyName + ' ' + firstName from USER_INFO c where b.supplier = c.alias ) as Supplier from USER_INFO a inner join HOBBY_INFO b on a.alias = b.alias where a.alias = #Alias#
select a.alias as Alias, a.familyName as FamilyName, a.firstName as FirstName, a.emailAddress as Email from USER_INFO a where a.fbUserId = #UserId#
